mapper.select: select go_test_blood_result.GO_TREAT_CODE as goTreatCode, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_BLOOD_SUGAR as goBloodTestBloodSugar, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_PLATELET as goBloodTestPlatelet, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_PATH as goBloodTestFilePath, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_NAME as goBloodTestFileName, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE as goBloodTestDate, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE as goBloodTestGoRegistrationDate from go_test_blood_result join go_treat on go_test_blood_result.GO_TREAT_CODE = go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE where (go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE between #{goFirstDate} and #{goSecondDate}) AND go_test_blood_result.GO_TREAT_CODE=#{goTreatCode}
